entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
